properties.name: beem.sms.api-url
properties.description: API provided by beem for sending sms

properties.name: beem.sms.api-key
properties.description: Username to use with beem sms API

properties.name: beem.sms.api-secret
properties.description: Password to use with beem sms API

properties.name: scheduler.fixed.delay
properties.description: Interval to use with fixedDelay scheduled methods

properties.name: scheduler.fixed.rate
properties.description: Interval to use with fixedRate scheduled methods

properties.name: scheduler.cron.interval
properties.description: Interval to use with scheduled methods in UNIX style cron-like expression

properties.name: security.jwt.expiration-time
properties.description: An expiration time for the JWT tokens

properties.name: security.jwt.secret-key
properties.description: A secret key used for the JWT computations

properties.name: app.web.base-url
properties.description: Base url for the frontend side of this api project
